alert.note: Alert for Northwestern San Juan Mountains; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide; Upper Gunnison River Valley (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 1:01PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Ouray County through 145 PM MDT... At 100 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Loghill Village, or 18 miles south of Montrose, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over northeastern Ouray County, including the following locations... Colona, Ridgeway, Log Hill. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 550 in Colorado between mile markers 101 and 115. Colorado 62 between mile markers 19 and 23. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northwestern San Juan Mountains; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide; Upper Gunnison River Valley
